chatPackage

Class Package

  • java.lang.Object
    • chatPackage.Package
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Package
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class defines the different type of messages that will be exchanged between the Clients and the Server
    Author:
    shay,dima and eran
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int LOGOUT
      LOGOUT to disconnect from the Server
      static int MESSAGE
      MESSAGE an ordinary message
      static int ONLINE_CLIENTS
      ONLINE_CLIENTS to receive the list of the users connected
      static int PRIVATE_MESSAGE
      PRIVATE_MESSAGE a private message
